If you got lost somewhere, you found a bug or need some help, we're happy to help you. Ubuntu <nowiki>[[Touch]]</nowiki> is put together by a community of many, who are eager to work together with you on this.

* Join us on '''IRC''' in <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-touch|#ubuntu-touch]]</nowiki> on irc.freenode.net and/or
* Join our '''mailing list''' by
## Joining the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-phone|ubuntu-phone team]]</nowiki> on Launchpad and
## leaving the "Subscribe me to the team's mailing list" option checked.
* Join those '''Telegram''' groups ''(You can use the <nowiki>[[http://www.webupd8.org/2015/01/install-official-telegram-desktop-app.html|desktop app]]</nowiki> or the <nowiki>[[https://uappexplorer.com/app/com.ubuntu.telegram|phone app]]</nowiki> on ubuntu, or choose the right client for you system <nowiki>[[https://telegram.org/apps|here]]</nowiki>)'' :
